mapper.insert: insert into gil_product(idx, filename, ptype, pname, pcontent, capacity, cost, pcode) values(PRODUCT_IDX_SEQUENCE.nextval, #{filename},#{ptype},#{pname},#{pcontent},#{capacity},#{cost}, #{pcode})
mapper.select: select idx,filename,pname,capacity,cost from gil_product where ptype='위스키'
select idx,filename,pname,capacity,cost from gil_product where ptype='보드카'
select idx,filename,pname,capacity,cost from gil_product where ptype='데킬라'
select idx,filename,pname,capacity,cost from gil_product where ptype='브랜디'
select idx,filename,pname,capacity,cost from gil_product where ptype='진'
select idx,filename,pname,capacity,cost from gil_product where ptype='기타주류'
select filename from gil_product where idx=#{idx}
select * from gil_product where pname like '%'||#{search}||'%' or ptype like '%'||#{search}||'%'
